page.title: 17Bethlehem Plus and Minus
page.content: The things I like about{Bethlehem}are that I can keep a pony and it is not very far from my home.In the summer we can walk to the river to swim in about twenty minutes.We can also ride our bikes to the river because there is not a lot of traffic on the roads. Another good thing is we don't have people living right next door to us, and there are not many people in the village so I know just about everybody here.We are also very lucky because the air is always clean and fresh for there are no{factories}or any other fumes to pollute the atmosphere.The things I don't like about{Bethlehem are there are no shops in the village, if you forget o'r run out of something .The other thing I dislike is that we do not have any buses exept once a week.
